definition: Date on which data was collected
Two-letter abbreviation for the state or territory
Total number of confirmed plus probable cases of COVID-19
Derived from other metrics (see readme for more details)
Cumulative number of completed PCR tests (or specimens tested) or other approved nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT)
Cumulative number of completed PCR tests (or specimens tested) or other approved nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT) that return positive
Cumulative number of completed PCR tests (or specimens tested) or other approved nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT) that return negative
Cumulative number of unique people tested at least once via PCR testing or other approved nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT)
Cumulative number of unique people with a positive PCR or other approved nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT)
Cumulative number of people tested per day via PCR testing or other approved nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT)
Cumulative number of completed antigen tests
Cumulative number of completed antigen tests that return positive
Cumulative number of unique people who have been tested at least once via antigen testing
Cumulative number of unique people with a completed antigen test that returned positive
